INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
Logistik Syd Portfolio

Cushman & Wakefield is pleased to present an attractive logistics portfolio located in southern Sweden.

Property Overview:
- Location: Malm√∂, Sweden
- Property Type: Logistics / Warehouse
- Total Leasable Area: 45,000 sqm
- WAULT: 6.2 years
- Occupancy Rate: 97%

Financial Summary:
- Net Operating Income: SEK 28,500,000
- Asking Yield: 5.25%
- Indicative Price: SEK 543 MSEK

The portfolio consists of three modern logistics facilities built between 2015-2020, strategically located near the E6 motorway with excellent access to Copenhagen and continental Europe.

Contact: Erik Svensson, Cushman & Wakefield
